disableParam_NT.Wiki: Parameters marked with are excluded in the NT version package.

EnableFastTravelEventFlagId.AltName: Enable Fast Travel Event Flag ID

WeatherLotTimeOffsetIngameSeconds.Wiki: Offset for weather lottery time (unit - in-game seconds). Divide by the in-game time scale of the game properties to get real time

WeatherCreateAssetLimitId.Wiki: ID used to limit the generation of assets generated by the weather asset generation parameter .xlsm

SoundIndoorType.Wiki: Set whether to divide the map GD setting indoor into indoor or completely indoor for sound (SEQ09833).

ReverbDefaultType.Wiki: Specifies the reverb default type for this map

BgmPlaceInfo.Wiki: Specify location default information for BGM

EnvPlaceInfo.Wiki: Specifies location default information for ambient sounds

MapAdditionalSoundBankId.Wiki: Specify the ID of the map addition bank of the sound to be additionally loaded (-1 - no map addition bank) (SEQ15725)

IsEnableBlendTimezoneEnvmap.Wiki: Specifies whether to time blend the environment map. Only Texure in the 0th time zone is shot and used. GPU load and memory are reduced. This setting is valid only for Legacy (m00-m49) (SEQ16464).

OverrideGIResolution_XSS.Wiki: Overwrites the GI resolution used in XSS (Xbox SeriesS, Lockhart)

MapLoHiChangeBorderDist_XZ.AltName: Map High Hit Switch - AABB Depth
MapLoHiChangeBorderDist_XZ.Wiki: Map high hit switching judgment AABB_width Depth (XZ) [m] (SEQ16295)

MapLoHiChangeBorderDist_Y.AltName: Map High Hit Switch - AABB Height
MapLoHiChangeBorderDist_Y.Wiki: Map high hit switching judgment AABB_ height (Y) [m] (SEQ16295)

MapLoHiChangePlayDist.AltName: Map High Hit Switch - Play Distance
MapLoHiChangePlayDist.Wiki: Map high hit switching judgment play distance [m]. Normally the default should be fine. For smaller AABB, adjust as needed. If the play is too small, switching will occur frequently. Not expected if larger than AABB size (SEQ 16295)

MapAutoDrawGroupBackFacePixelNum.AltName: Automatic Draw Group - Back Side Pixel Count
MapAutoDrawGroupBackFacePixelNum.Wiki: Number of pixels to be judged on the back side in automatic drawing group calculation

PlayerLigntScale.Wiki: Specify the scale to be applied to the PC and PC horse resident light source on this map (SEQ16562).

IsEnableTimezonnePlayerLigntScale.Wiki: Does this map change the Player light intensity scale depending on the PC, PC horse resident light source, and time zone? (SEQ 16562)

isDisableAutoCliffWind.Wiki: Do you want to disable automatic cliff wind SE? (SEQ15729)

OpenChrActivateThreshold.Wiki: Open character activation limit_evaluation value threshold

MapMimicryEstablishmentParamId.Wiki: Mimicry probability parameter ID by map (SEQ22471)

OverrideGIResolution_XSX.Wiki: Overwrites the GI resolution used on XSX (Xbox Series X, Anaconda)
